name: Moderna
why: Known for pioneering mRNA-based vaccine technology.

name: BioNTech
why: Partnered with Pfizer to develop mRNA vaccines for infectious diseases.

name: CureVac
why: One of the earliest companies to explore mRNA vaccine technology.

name: Nature Biotechnology
why: Represents global publishing impact in biotech research.

name: Science
why: Publishes high-impact biotechnology and life sciences research.

name: Cell
why: Features cutting-edge findings in molecular and cell biology.

name: Salk Institute
why: Leads in foundational biological and neurological studies.

name: MIT Whitehead Institute
why: A leader in biomedical research and genomics innovation.

name: Francis Crick Institute
why: Pioneering UK research institute in molecular biology and genetics.

name: CRISPR Therapeutics
why: Front-runner in CRISPR-based genomic editing therapies.

name: Editas Medicine
why: Develops gene-editing technologies for inherited diseases.

name: Intellia Therapeutics
why: Focuses on in vivo CRISPR therapies for genetic disorders.

name: Genentech
why: Biotech commercialization leader with focus on oncology and immunology.

name: Amgen
why: Major biotechnology company focusing on therapeutic innovations.

name: Regeneron
why: Known for monoclonal antibody research and gene therapy development.

name: DeepMind
why: Pioneered AlphaFold for protein structure prediction.

name: Insilico Medicine
why: Uses generative AI for drug discovery and development.

name: BenevolentAI
why: Combines AI and biomedical data for target discovery.

name: Pfizer
why: Major pharmaceutical company collaborating on mRNA vaccine tech.

name: Novartis
why: Global pharma leader integrating AI in clinical research.

name: AstraZeneca
why: Develops biologics and AI-assisted vaccine platforms.

name: Broad Institute
why: Leading genomics and biomedical data research institute.

name: Wellcome Sanger Institute
why: Pioneered large-scale genome sequencing initiatives.

name: J. Craig Venter Institute
why: Known for synthetic genomics and human genome sequencing.

name: Insitro
why: Integrates machine learning and biology for drug discovery.

name: Arzeda
why: Computational protein design company using AI and biochemistry.

name: Ginkgo Bioworks
why: Specializes in synthetic biology and cell programming.

name: Recursion Pharmaceuticals
why: Uses AI and automation for large-scale drug discovery.

name: Tempus
why: Applies AI to precision medicine and clinical data analytics.

name: PathAI
why: AI diagnostics company focusing on pathology and disease detection.
